title: Startup Meetup
details: Network with budding entrepreneurs and investors at this exciting startup event. Learn how to pitch your idea effectively and raise capital from leading angel investors. Sessions include startup funding, MVP building, and growth hacking. Enjoy real-world success stories from founders who’ve scaled their ventures. Interactive Q&A and rapid pitching round. Bring your ideas, your questions, and your passion. Light refreshments and networking kits provided.
location: CoWork Hub Building, 67 Founders Lane, Central City

title: Finance Bootcamp
details: Understand the basics of budgeting, saving, and investing. This bootcamp will guide you on building strong financial habits. Learn from industry professionals about stocks, mutual funds, and SIPs. Suitable for beginners and intermediate learners. Get templates and tools to manage personal finances. Attendees receive a certificate of participation. Build your roadmap to financial independence. Live Q&A and expert panel discussion.

title: Health Summit
details: Explore holistic health solutions from experts in nutrition, fitness, and mental wellbeing. Topics include sustainable diet plans, stress reduction methods, and preventive care. Learn from real-life transformations and evidence-based practices. Group yoga sessions, wellness product sampling, and fitness challenges. Attendees receive a wellness goodie bag. Improve your lifestyle with guidance from top coaches. Take charge of your health, today!
location: Wellness Arena Complex, 98 Healthy Street, East City

title: Photography Walk
details: Join a community of photo enthusiasts on a scenic walk through heritage-rich city zones. Capture the golden hour, historical buildings, and street life. Guided by professional photographers sharing live tips. Participate in live mini-contests and win cool photography gear. Perfect for beginners and experienced shooters. Capture memories, learn techniques, and explore storytelling through lenses. Get your best clicks featured in our community gallery!
location: City Fort Entrance Gate, Old Town Area

title: Tech Career Fair
details: Connect with top tech companies and recruiters in this annual tech-focused career fair. Explore job openings, internship opportunities, and networking lounges. Participate in mock interviews and resume reviews. Attend workshops on LinkedIn optimization and career growth. Gain insights into what recruiters look for. Hear tech professionals share real-life hiring stories. Open for both students and working professionals. Spot hiring available!
location: Tech Grounds Convention Hall, City Center

title: Art Therapy Workshop
details: Relax and explore your inner creativity through therapeutic art sessions. No experience needed—just bring yourself. Led by licensed art therapists using colors and patterns for healing. Activities include painting, clay modeling, and mindful sketching. Learn how to express emotions through visuals. Group sharing circles included to enhance emotional bonding. All materials provided. Refreshments served post-session.
location: Mindful Space Studio, 21 Peace Street, South City
